updates.title: Figma's acquisition of AI media generation company Weavy signals major push into AI-powered design workflows, with integration planned across the entire Figma platform in coming months.

Nvidia's $1 billion investment in AI coding platform Poolside, following their record-breaking $5 trillion valuation, indicates massive enterprise AI development acceleration expected through November.
ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio model commoditization within months, suggesting major pricing shifts and increased competition in voice synthesis tools for creators.

Apple Intelligence expansion accelerates as Tim Cook confirms plans to integrate multiple third-party AI tools into iOS, with Microsoft's agent platform strategy positioning for enterprise AI workflows.
Character.AI's decision to end chatbot experiences for minors reflects broader AI safety concerns that will likely drive new platform restrictions and compliance requirements across the industry.
